mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.project_name, p.project_description, p.creator_id, creator.username as creator_name, p.created_time, p.updated_time, pu.user_id, u.username as user_name, pu.assigned_time FROM projects p LEFT JOIN users creator ON p.creator_id = creator.id LEFT JOIN project_users pu ON p.id = pu.project_id LEFT JOIN users u ON pu.user_id = u.id ORDER BY p.created_time DESC, pu.assigned_time ASC

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.project_name, p.project_description, p.creator_id, creator.username as creator_name, p.created_time, p.updated_time, pu.user_id, u.username as user_name, pu.assigned_time FROM projects p LEFT JOIN users creator ON p.creator_id = creator.id LEFT JOIN project_users pu ON p.id = pu.project_id LEFT JOIN users u ON pu.user_id = u.id WHERE pu.user_id = #{assigneeId} ORDER BY p.created_time DESC, pu.assigned_time ASC
